Reviews.Title: “Great stay at La Quinta”
Reviews.Author: Posted by a La Quinta traveler
Reviews.Content: We were very happy with everything and the people working there were super nice. The only disappointment we had was the last day of our stay, for the pool was shut down. It was a beautiful day and our grandchildren were very sad.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: John R
Reviews.Content: Beds were nice rooms were clean. Very quite area with little traffic coming in and out next to industrial area and close to many good resturants.

Reviews.Title: “If you are looking for a clean place to sleep.....”
Reviews.Author: twinboysplusone
Reviews.Content: My family just got back from a stay at the La Quinta this weekend. We went to Phoenix to catch some Spring Training games and the location of this hotel was very central to all the games. The best part of the hotel would have to be the location and also the clean and refurbished rooms. The parts that were not so great were the pool - my kids were really wanting to go in but it didn't look that clean to me so I wasn't comfortable letting them go in. Also the breakfast not only wasn't good but the person in charge of breakfast was not helpful at all - even for free it's not worth it. They had a small selection of fruits - oranges and apples - would have loved to see some bananas in there. They had cereal but not the individual boxes I would have preferred and they had make your own waffles - but I wasn't successful in making the waffles they kept sticking to the machine and the person who was supposed to be helping actually implied that it was my fault the waffles were sticking but didn't offer to help me! The last thing I didn't care for was the other guests - some of them gave me the creeps - one of them actually yelled at my kids for being too noisy at the pool area which just made everyone feel uncomfortable and not welcome. As far as the rooms - they were fine and very clean. The hotel was perfect to sleep at but if you are planning on spending much time hanging around a hotel this probably isn't the place I would pick.

Reviews.Title: “Clean and just refurbished”
Reviews.Author: scmexico
Reviews.Content: We stayed here after an overseas trip to South America. I didn't want to drive to Tucson after being on airplanes for 24 hours. It was much cheaper than hotels closer to PHX airport. The hotel has just been refurbished and our room was just great. I highly recommend this hotel. Sean the desk clerk was very friendly and helpful.

Reviews.Title: “Just OK!”
Reviews.Author: azwi
Reviews.Content: Not very impressed with the hotel.......... Pros: large room, comfortable beds, clean, great location. Cons: breakfast was not impressive, not much of a selection at all!!!! Coffee tasted like warm brown water! Two of the 3 days-no paper was delivered to the room when other rooms received it. Not enough towels. Pool water was cold and hot tub, which did not work, was boiling hot! The main elevator, which was extremely slow, looked more like a service elevator. The business center, if you would call it that, consisted of one out dated computer and printer that was out of ink. Summary: don’t waste your time or money, there’s a Holiday Inn right next door that will offer you a better experience!

Reviews.Title: “Good Location - Good value”
Reviews.Author: msp2phl
Reviews.Content: If your just looking for a clean basic hotel to spend time in to sleep and freshen up the La Quinta is a good choice. Very basic hotel and easy to find right off the highway. The breakfast isn't worth even sampling, go next door to theCracker Barrel for a good home cooked breakfast. The room rate was the reason we stayed here.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay at La Quinta Chandler Arizona”
Reviews.Author: elifantlover
Reviews.Content: Great service from desk clerk. He was very accommodating. Housekeeping was very loud in the morning. Two Hispanic ladies talking very loudly. (probably trying to wake up everyone so they could clean the rooms was my impression). Comfortable and clean. We stay here every 2 years on our way to or back from a family reunion in New Mexico.

Reviews.Title: “Nice, clean & quite.”
Reviews.Author: LadyFan55
Reviews.Content: We are a family of 5, 2 adults and 3 teen/pre-teen boys. We traveled to Phoenix to visit my brother over a busy graduation weekend. We looked for a nice place nearby their home. The La Quinta Inn served that purpose very well. Beds - We stayed in the 2 queen room, but I do think the beds are "full's" and not actually queens. They were very comfortable beds, pillows & linens. (Note - only 4 of us stayed in the room each night as the boys rotated spending the night with their cousins). Storage - draw and closet space is limited. Bathroom - average size, nice shower. Condition - our entire room and the whole hotel for that matter was spotless! The daily maid service was excellent. Staff - efficient, not overly friendly, but not unfriendly either. Breakfast - too crowded, they should spread the food better to help reduce the lines/crowding. Food was fine. The hotel is pet friendly, but you could tell these only by the doggy/potty-bag station and the occasional pet we saw. There was not frig, so we just kept our cooler filled with ice from the ice machine. For the price, we found this hotel to be an excellent value and plan to stay each time we visit our family.

Reviews.Title: “I can't recommend this place...walls are paper thin”
Reviews.Author: daltexranger
Reviews.Content: First off, upon arrival I was placed on the ground floor at the end of the hall next to exit door and elevator. although the room appeared good at first, the noise during the first night prevented me from sleeping soundly. also there were what appeared to be make up stains on the bathroom vanity. when I asked to move room, I was placed on the 4th floor, although I am in non smoking room, the smell from the smoking rooms down the hall is quite noticeable. it would be much better if the windows opened especially now that the temp here is cooler. in my new room, I have noticed doors banding and people coughing in the other rooms...not very soothing at all..both elevators I have seen have been very dingy...definitely need spruced up.

Reviews.Title: “A Decent Choice for the Money”
Reviews.Author: whateverintexas
Reviews.Content: I've stayed at this La Quinta Inn & Suites several times, but not since January 2007. A few years ago, this was a very nice place, and it is still a good choice. It has aged a little bit, but it's been well maintained for the most part. The rooms are clean and spacious, and the common areas are clean as well. The staff is friendly, the breakfast is fresh, and the shower pressure is good in the shower. I like that this is a pet-friendly hotel, and it is conveniently located right off of I-10 in Chandler, one of the nicer parts of Phoenix. One thing that bothered me is that there was a used towel hanging on the towel hook in my bathroom; apparently, the maid missed it? Details like this bother me! but in this case, I'll be generous and say that this is still a great bargain for the price. I hope they do a renovation soon and bring this hotel back to its sparkling old self! In the meantime, it's still holding on!

Reviews.Title: “Great accommodation and excellent facilities”
Reviews.Author: crb1404
Reviews.Content: Clean, well run and a great location. Pool, fitness room and business center all great and breakfast was very acceptable. Easy location and a Cracker Barrel within walking distance.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay”
Reviews.Author: azjudyann
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this place to anyone. Since I used my AAA discount, I then popped for the king room with a refrigerator and microwave. Definitely worth the extra $9. Some people might not have liked the slight highway sound outside, but that's what earplugs and/or running the a/c are for! (It is, afterall, in the AZ desert, so the a/c running is a given.) The room was spacious and clean. I was very pleased.

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay at a Reasonable Price”
Reviews.Author: jmdb223
Reviews.Content: Overall we had a great experience. Room was clean, service staff was very friendly, pool area was well kept, and breakfast included lots of options. My only disappointment was the fitness area - there were only a few basic cardio machines in a small room.

Reviews.Title: “Very noisy”
Reviews.Author: off2hawaii14
Reviews.Content: Spent three nights at the La Quinta Inn and Suites in Chandler, AZ. It is very close to the highway and my room was on the side facing the highway so I heard vehicle noise all night long. The other side might be quieter but I didn't not check that out.. I did not have the free breakfast but it looked like the typical complimentary fare. The staff was very nice, rooms were clean but dated. I would not stay again but only because of the noise.

Reviews.Title: “Ended a good run.......”
Reviews.Author: EnglandTourist
Reviews.Content: La Quinta was the last hotel we stayed in during a 3 week road trip. It was also the most expensive and the worst. We sensed problems ahead when we arrived to check-in at 3pm and the receptionist wasn't sure if our room was ready. Our room was OK, with a larger than average bathroom, however the beds were on the hard side. Our room overlooked the I17 which was a bit noisy but not enough to warrant changing to another. Best to request a room on the other side of the building. If you are not a pet lover, stay away. We saw almost as many pooches as human guests. We witnessed a disgruntled guest pacing the floor by the reception desk, moaning about the handwritten sign which said "back in 5 minutes". This is hardly good business practice. I got the overall impression that they were seriously understaffed. The worst thing about this place was the breakfast. By comparison the selection of food was very limited. Having opted for just a slice of toast, I could not believe there were no butter portions; only margarine. Cheapskates! The cold milk container was empty and the girl on duty didn't seem to care or bother. We could have chosen from dozens of other places to stay - we only wish we had.

HotelInfo.Name: La Quinta Inn & Suites Phoenix Chandler
HotelInfo.Address: 15241 South 50th Street, Phoenix, AZ 85044
